name: Biker Dude Road Riders: A Motorcycle Racing Game
name_original: Biker Dude Road Riders: A Motorcycle Racing Game
description:
Now who doesn't like to ride a chopper motorbike...!
Note : Do not forget to set your Graphics Settings in Main Menu.

Get ready to ride a heavy bike on highway while racing your way through the heavy traffic. Be careful not to hit the traffic cars or the side concrete barriers otherwise at such a high speed your character will be thrown off the chopper flying high in the sky like a flightless bird lol. The game features 5 different environments. You can drive on the roads of venice and enjoy the city view or go on a long trip in the beautiful greenland or you can also test yourself by going on a ride in the desert and watch the sunset. Or you might be a person who loves to drive on long bridges on the sea and enjoy the view. Suit yourself and ride...

The game offers beautiful graphics and awesome handling.
Try to ride as far as you can and share your score with your friends.
